reviews.review_msg: Weekly quizzes, assignments and 3 papers with no final exam. Lectures can be a bit boring, but the content is interesting.
Great prof! Despite lectures being all on zoom, Dr. Begby did a great job of conveying course material. 10/10 would recommend

He's genuinely the most caring professor out there, and always down to converse and answer any questions asked. Participation matters in tutorials and there's quite a lot of mini in-class assignments and a few papers but they are very straightforward. Be sure to read the material he provides for better understanding of the content.

Begby is a nice guy overall but his lectures were excruciatingly dry and boring, I took this class as a GPA booster because I thought the material looked interesting but boy do I regret it; his marking is fair but his only TA marks way too hard for a first year class and often made condescending remarks about how she was grumpy while marking

Endre's class was one of my favourites this semester! He was very good at making everything clear, even things that I had previously been unfamiliar with. He welcomes class participation and really cares about his students, even making the effort to get to know them on a more personal level. Would highly recommend taking 121 with him!

Knows his material. He is super knowledgeable about his field. There is no textbook, just free, accessible online readings which is extremely respectable. There are 3 papers and a final exam, a fair bit of writing but not super difficult to achieve a good grade. Overall really interesting course, would definitely recommend it.

The class did have a lot of writing, - multiple assignments and 3 papers ranging from 1 page to 6 pages. However, Endre made the class very interesting . Attending lecture made the content a lot easier to understand, and he provided very in depth and eye opening insight on a variety of social issues.
good prof., encourages students to ask questions

Favourite professor + a really interesting class! He loves when people ask questions, and encourages class discussions. If you are looking for a GPA booster, don't take this class. At the beginning of the semester, my TA said they don't really give A's.

Such an intellectual man. His lectures make it really easy to understand the material. Attend all lectures!! They will really help you succeed. TA was a bit of a tough marker though. Course material is very valuable and there isn't too much work. Weekly readings

One of the best professors I have had. The course content was already very interesting, but Endre Begby has a way of making you question it all without being confused. He's also very friendly, helpful, and approachable, and seems to genuinely enjoy teaching. I would definitely recommend the course with him to everyone!
